author: Antoine Chambert-Loir
title: The Krull dimension of the semiring of natural numbers is equal to 2
description: Let $R$ be a ring. Its Krull dimension is the supremum of the lengths $n$ of chains $P_0\subsetneq P_1 \subsetneq\dots\subsetneq P_n$ of pri...
content:
Let $R$ be a ring. Its Krull dimension is the supremum of the lengths $n$ of chains $P_0\subsetneq P_1 \subsetneq\dots\subsetneq P_n$
of prime ideals of $R$. When $R$ is a field, the null ideal is t… [+5483 chars]
